headline: Valero Energy Corporation (VLO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Valero Energy Corporation on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VLO. Valero Energy Corporation ‘s share was trading at $136.81 as of August 18th. VLO’s trailing and forward P/E were 55.17 and 19.27 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
